item.title: Renaming files with `mv`, `rename` and `R`
item.description: For a project I have been working on for quite some time now, I ended up handling thousands of files and as I initially named them poorly, I had to rename a bunch of them… Basically, I needed to do two kind of file name manipulations. problem 1 is kind of trivial : replacing the same part of the file names by another, e.g. renaming res_old1_001.txt, res_old1_002.txt, …, res_old1_010.txt to res_new2_001.
